newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Comercial del Plata in $65 mln capital increase.
newsitem.headline: Comercial del Plata in $65 mln capital increase.

text.p: The Buenos Aires Stock Exchnage said Thursday it has approved a $65 million capital increase by holding company Comercial del Plata SA.
The increase is made up of 6.5 million ordinary shares valued at $10 each, it said.
